locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: Big place for a family of 5, full of dirty dishes.

locations.name: Living Room
locations.description: Smaller than the kitchen, but still big. A TV that's been on for a while.

locations.name: Hallway
locations.description: A narrow and long hallway, full of family photos.

locations.name: Main Room
locations.description: A king size bed and a lot of dirty clothes.
